00444   /*
00445      @author Rahul Sampath
00446      @brief Splits a communication group into two, processors with 
00447      ranks less than splittingRank form one group and the other 
00448      processors form the second group. Both the groups are sorted in 
00449      the ascending order of their ranks in the old comm.
00450      @param splittingRank The rank used for splitting the communicator
00451      @param orig_comm    The comm group that needs to be split.
00452      @param new_comm     The new comm group.
00453      */
00454   int splitCommUsingSplittingRank(int splittingRank, MPI_Comm* new_comm, MPI_Comm orig_comm);
